t: Amazon Logo and symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: The Amazon logo is composed of a wordmark “Amazon” in the lowercase letters. Under the lettering there is a smooth and bold yellow arrow, coming from the letter “A” to “Z”, forming a smile. The first versions of this emblem contained the “.com” part, but it was removed after the branded started expanding its activity ...
